Html:
Or tell me how I can add it so I can add Shifting Naaru Silver :)
Thanks
From b14.1 release notes, "   - Added parsing for Shifting Naaru Sliver and Shattered Sun Pendant of Acumen."
Thanks! Didnt even see the new release

In the release notes there is written that the parsing was added.
I have opened the properties for "Shattered Sun Pendant of Acumen" and saw a "Shattered Sun caster Neck proc" assigned (1).
However, in terms of DPS the assigned proc does nothing, I have the same DPS without it.
I also have the same DPS with a random Item with Sta/Int and +37 Spell Damage.
Could you add a property to the Char for Aldor/Scryer exalted to correctly calculate the gain in DPS for the proc please?

In the meantime I would like to manually add a proc that does the same for my Mage (Aldor exalted). Is it the normal 120 Spelldamage/10s-Proc?
